settings.label: First Call to Action Button Text
First Call to Action Button Link
First Slide Text
settings.default: An entrepreneur in every sense of the word, Daymond John has come a long way from his $40 budget by growing FUBU into a six billion dollar brand. The Founder of FUBU, Presidential Ambassador of Global Entrepreneurship and Co-star of ABC's Shark Tank, is a celebrated pioneer in the fashion industry, best-selling author, branding guru and highly sought after motivational speaker.

settings.label: Content Position
settings.info: Determines where the text content for this slide will go.

settings.label: Second Slide Text
settings.default: John's track record as an award-winning entrepreneur includes receiving over 35 awards including the Brandweek Marketer of the Year, Advertising Age Marketing 1000 Award for Outstanding Ad Campaign, and Ernst & Young's New York Entrepreneur of the Year Award.

settings.label: Content Position
settings.info: Determines where the text content for this slide will go.

settings.label: Third Slide Text
settings.default: John's track record as an award-winning entrepreneur includes receiving over 35 awards including the Brandweek Marketer of the Year, Advertising Age Marketing 1000 Award for Outstanding Ad Campaign, and Ernst & Young's New York Entrepreneur of the Year Award.

settings.label: Content Position
settings.info: Determines where the text content for this slide will go.

settings.label: Fourth Slide Text 1
settings.default: In May 2015, the White House appointed John, Global Ambassador of Entrepreneurship as part of the PAGE Program. His signature initiative will be to work with underserved entrepreneurs and emerging digital influencers to help them build customer bases and brands.

settings.label: Fourth Slide Text 2
settings.default: John has also been tapped to work with President Obama on his My Brother's Keeper program, which will help create access and opportunity for underserved men of color via mentorship and education.

settings.label: Content Position
settings.info: Determines where the text content for this slide will go.

settings.label: Fifth Slide Text 1
settings.default: As a consultant, Daymond will examine the needs of your business, dissect the problems, and create manageable solutions for brand growth. He will also help improve your business' profitability by enhancing the marketing structure and strategy.

settings.label: Fifth Slide Text 2
settings.default: As a motivational speaker, Daymond's quintessential rags-to-riches success story of sacrifice, hard work, and perseverance as well as the unique and charismatic way he communicates it, will inspire any audience.

settings.label: Content Position
settings.info: Determines where the text content for this slide will go.

settings.label: CTA Text
settings.default: FREE CHAPTER OF THE POWER OF BROKE AND A FREE GUIDE ON MY SHARK POINTS

settings.label: Featured Collection
settings.info: Set to 'None' to only use best sellers

settings.label: Best Sellers Collection
settings.info: Set to 'None' to only use featured products. Make sure to set this collection to sort by best sellers!

settings.content: Below can choose from three ways to display the products on your collections pages and the number to paginate each collection by.

All regular size with details below image. All larger size with details fixed on top of the image at bottom. Feature first three products larger with details on top of the image and the rest with regular sized images and details below the image. This option will only apply when viewing collections not in tags, types, or vendors views.

options.label: Featured first three products larger and rest regular

settings.label: AJAX add to cart
settings.info: Keeps from redirecting customer to cart when they add a product to their cart.

options.label: Main product image will zoom on hover
Main product image will enlarge on click

settings.label: Variant title of variant used in image/variant linking
Related Products Section
settings.info: Activating this will show related products as described [here](http://wiki.shopify.com/Related_Products#Using_Product_Metafields) or default to products in same collection if you don't use the metafields app. If none are found it will hide.

settings.label: Social Sharing
settings.info: Activating this will show sharing options.

settings.label: Facebook Comments Wall
settings.info: Activating this will show the Facebook Comments Wall below your product details.

settings.label: Facebook Admin Account
settings.info: Should be your username or actual Facebook ID #.

settings.label: Disqus username
settings.info: You must enter your Disqus username! [http://disqus.com/](http://disqus.com/)

settings.label: New Popup Form Button Background Color
New Popup Form Button Text Color
Popup Form Position
settings.info: Determines whether the form aligns with the bottom of the poup or is custom positioned.

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Page to use contact form on

settings.content: Choose what you would like to show up in each template's sidebar sections.
Widgets can be used in sidebars and home content sections.

settings.label: Blog to use for Blog Widgets
Twitter Widget Title:
settings.info: Defaults to link to Twitter Handle.

settings.label: Twitter Widget Embed Code:
settings.info: Follow [these instructions](http://support.shopaholla.com/customer/portal/articles/934714-twitter-widget-setup) and paste your embed code here.

settings.label: Facebook Page URL:
settings.info: URL to Facebook Page you want to be "Liked".
